summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources, authorizing application to and execution of an agreement with the Washington Council for Prevention of Child Abuse and Neglect for the provision of a Child Abuse Prevention Training for Day Care Providers Project through the Child and Family Resource Center, establishing fees to be charged by the Child and Family Resource Center for the Child Abuse Training Project and other similar services, authorizing membership fees to be charged organizations supporting the Child and Family Resource Center increasing expenditure allowances in the 1986 Budget of the Department of Human Resources and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Human Resources Operating Fund.
